summary: This is a memorandum from the Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG) documenting a voluntary interview conducted on August 4, 2021, with the Facilities Manager of the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York. The interview is part of an official OIG investigation into the death of inmate Jeffrey Epstein at the MCC. The memorandum lists attachments including the interview transcript, warnings form, emails, and video/screenshot documentation related to camera systems at the facility.

keyFacts: The DOJ Office of the Inspector General conducted an investigation into the death of BOP inmate Jeffrey Epstein at the MCC New York.
A voluntary interview of the MCC New York Facilities Manager was recorded on August 4, 2021, as part of this investigation.
Attachments to the memorandum include a transcribed interview, a warnings form, emails, a screenshot of MCC New York video, and camera service request documentation.
Camera system documentation indicates a new system was purchased in late 2018, and service requests were initiated in February and August 2019.
The identities of the interviewing agents (except for Special Agent S.'s initial) and the Facilities Manager are redacted in this cover memorandum.
